changeSet.author: Aleksander.shukurov@gmail.com
changeSet.comment: fill in the table "user_role_links" with test data
changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery), count_series AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS quantity FROM series) INSERT INTO device_pings (weight, height, pulse, temperature, heartbeat, respiratory_rate, systolic_pressure, diastolic_pressure, inserted_date_at_utc, updated_date_at_utc, device_id) select RANDOM() * (150 - 1) + 1, RANDOM() * (250 - 1) + 1, FLOOR(RANDOM() * (150 - 40) + 40), RANDOM() * (45 - 35) + 35, FLOOR(RANDOM() * (150 - 40) + 40), FLOOR(RANDOM() * (25 - 12) + 12), FLOOR(RANDOM() * (250 - 60) + 60), FLOOR(RANDOM() * (200 - 50) + 50), NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (499 - 1) + 1)) * INTERVAL '1 day', FLOOR(RANDOM() * (cs.quantity - 1) + 1) FROM series s, count_series cs
